local helper = battle_helper
local table_names = tables

---@type fsm_battle_base
local super = require(helper.path.battle_fsm .. 'fsm/fsm_battle_base')

---@class battle_fsm_skill : fsm_battle_base
local battle_fsm_skill = class("battle_fsm_skill", super)

---构造函数
---@protected
---@param context context
function battle_fsm_skill:ctor(context)
    super.ctor(self, table_names.BTLState.ids.BTLState_Skill, context)
end

---进入状态
---@protected
---@param _ entity
function battle_fsm_skill:enter_state(_)
end

---退出状态
---@protected
---@param _ entity
function battle_fsm_skill:exit_state(_)
end

return battle_fsm_skill
